Introduction

Seung Hun is a South Korean singer and actor currently under C9 Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group CIX and the project boy group B.D.U.

In November 2018, Seung Hun became a contestant on the survival show YG Treasure Box. Originally eliminated in episode 9, he was brought back into the competition for its finale. However, he was once again eliminated.

He debuted as a member of C9 Entertainment's boy group CIX on July 23, 2019, with the mini album 'Hello' Chapter 1. Hello, Stranger.

He participated in Mnet's Build Up, he won with the team HunMinJayBit, in which he will become a member of B.D.U a 4-member project group. The debut is June 26, 2024.
